website_summaries.verdict: The perfect survival book to share with your kids. Full of fun hacks you can easily try at home.
pros: Each of the survival hacks seems realistic and easily attainable by the average person
Many can be done at home just for fun
Stewart includes background about when and how he learned each of the tips and tricks
Many hacks have funny or clever names, making them perfect to share with kids
cons: Some hacks require preparation and wouldn't be helpful in outdoor emergency situations

customer_reviews.title: Nothing new...
customer_reviews.text: The 200 hacks weren't new. The hand drawn pictures were not terribly useful. Out of the 200 topics, I would only count 10 or so as being meanful to me. Perhaps if you were just starting out down this trail it'd be more valuable, but anyone with more than a year or two of research into the survival woodcraft fields will be disappointed. I was excited about this book, but it was not at all what I expected based on Creek's earlier books which I thought were great.
customer_reviews.author: JTA

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book as a Father's Day present for my husband. The book is fun, but do not buy it if you are expecting it to show you serious survival techniques of any sort. The majority of the ideas are more of a "perhaps fun to try as a neat science experiment", but a lot of them are not even that....(like the bra-breathing mask). In all honestly, there were less than five that we think could actually be used in a survival situation...but even then it would have to be a perfectly constructed survival situation, where you had all of the spare materials that you needed for each 'hack'.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: A web search would've saved money
customer_reviews.text: This is a collection of things you will likely find on pinterest or any other website that offered survival tips. The book contained some illustrations. A web search would've given you better photos and illustrations to help on your survival hack research. I was very tempted to return the book to Amazon, but I'll just add it to my research library.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Reader

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INFORMATION TO ADD TO COLLECTION
customer_reviews.text: LOVE ALL of CREEK STEWARTS BOOKS! Can't go wrong with any of them! Great Survival and Everyday living information to add to your knowledge and BOBs (Bug Out Bags) for Emergency whether it be earthquakes, floods, or worse- when the SHTF! Rememer ..... It's NOT IF...... BUT WHEN!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Folks

customer_reviews.title: I found the book to be boring I wouldn't recommend I thought this was a book ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the book to be boring I wouldn't recommend I thought this was a book on survival in the wilderness like for example things that I could use in the wilderness to survive not with things u can find at home to survive
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Decent book
customer_reviews.text: Ok, let's put this book in perspective, noticed this one review that said this is not a wilderness survival book. Let me first start off and say you are not going to be any place in the world that people have not left their trash laying around to include diserted Islands trash is always comming to shore on them and I have been in some places were no one is around for 100's miles but I have always found junk laying around from people in one form or another. That being said this is a very useful book to own and read because you can always repurpose something laying around... Good read
customer_reviews.author: Robert Martin

customer_reviews.title: NEVER Learn Enough About Preparedness!
customer_reviews.text: Thought as a long time 20 year consultant on Preparedness and Survival I had learned enough! WRONG! As the old saying goes: NEVER STOP LEARNING! Creek has opened my eyes to numerous McGyver styled hacks that I plan to experiment with and create. I had never considered that PALLETS could be an excellent tent! I pulled off the poptop on a can and put it aside for doing the tent ties!
customer_reviews.author: HughSimpson

customer_reviews.title: Clever book!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people are hating on this book. Stop hating and open your eyes. It’s suggestion for if you are in a city/suburban area and are stuck in ohhh say a survival situation. Let’s be real, these are found things that are along your journey or in your back yard. Any where you go there are always people who have been there before so this book affords useful information on how to pick through what other humans might think are useless. It’s got good information.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jo

customer_reviews.title: Best of Creek Stewart's books
customer_reviews.text: I have all of Creek Stewart's books so far. This is by far the best informational documentation of survival hacks using simple items that nearly everyone has their house. It is informative yet has a bit of fun and humor, and easy to follow directions. This is my favorite book of Creek Stewart's writings. I love it and it's well worth the cost. in fact I would have paid more for this book.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Fitzcharles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for so many reasons.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book. Although a lot of thlkoooings inside I’ve knownk of or seen on YouTube, there was so much that OoI had never even thought about. If your into ocrafty survival tricks or just want to surpriselkk your friends this is the book for you. You will learn a lot but you must remember that these are skills and some of these tips takes practice. A lot of these can be used everyday and not just in a survival situation. I highly recommend this book especially to those first getting into prepping or everyday survival. I have done quite a few of these tips with my kids as a fun quirky learning project.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Green

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected! Knowing Creek's work I should have known his book would include much more than the usual rehashing of the same old tips every 'survivalist' copies in their videos and books. From page one I was pleased to find many hacks I had not heard of or neat twists on tried and true practices. Enjoyed reading (twice so far) and am looking forward to "Stuck". Keep up the good work, Creek and I hope to see more of your shows like Fat Guys.
customer_reviews.author: Darlynn Fine

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Creek Stewart is FAN-tastic!! I emphasize the fan because as one he is just so amazing. I had the privilege of speaking with him when I wrote to him after my father passed away and he is the most genuine caring man who happens to know his stuff when it comes to survival. Besides the bible, this book is a definite must for me whenever I am going camping. So fun for my whole family to try the hacks in this book. My children range from 3-13 and they all love it. Creek's the BEST and you will not be disappointed with this book!! Now I just have to get my hands on one of his Bug Out Bags!!!
customer_reviews.author: mommy4

customer_reviews.title: The Best Author on Survival Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have every one of Creek Stewart's books (which there are many if you include the Pocket Field Guides). He is very informative, down to Earth, and easy to understand. He makes survival skills easy to learn and fun. I recommend all his books for a complete survival library. He covers it all and this book is no different.
customer_reviews.author: Bill ComeauTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: Refers u to websites often for instruct-WHAT??
customer_reviews.text: There are many times in this book that it tells u to go on line to learn how to do something. Duh! That helps when you’re out in the cruel world hacking it out! Not. There’s a few interesting things.....then it says to go on line for the instruct.....what??
customer_reviews.author: cathy catnap

customer_reviews.title: Just a jewel in the crown
customer_reviews.text: For the Macguiver in all of us this book really is chocked full of great hacks while out in the woods, urban setting or wherever one finds themselves in need of something fixed - using common items Pairs well with his Bug out Bag book as well.
customer_reviews.author: crazyeye

customer_reviews.title: It is packed with great ideas and instructions that will make you rethink every ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is a must read for preppers and survivalist. It is packed with great ideas and instructions that will make you rethink every common place item you come in contact with on a daily basis. Unlike other survival books, this book gives you ideas for both rural and urban situations. One of the greatest things about this book is there is absolutely no filler. The information is given is very concises, one page, blurbs. Secondly, the information is presented in such a way that it is easily adaptable to any given situation. Think of this book as a tool that teaches you to think like a survivalist.
customer_reviews.author: T. Koehl

customer_reviews.title: Best Hacks Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well put together and FUN book to read! However, I will admit it is difficult to read more than a few pages without stopping to go and experiment a hack! These are very creative ideas for not only survival, but also for camping and just everyday life. No need to spend a fortune on the latest and greatest gadgets, just be smart and look at the world around you. God has given us excellent resources and Creek knows how to tap into them! Creek is BOSS! And now you can be too! Just buy the book already!
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: My #1 choice for survival tricks
customer_reviews.text: I almost never leave reviews on Amazon and I buy a LOT of things on here. This book, however, is so good that I felt compelled to rate it. Usually when I pick up books like this, the information contained inside are things I already know. Literally, within 5 minutes of flipping through this book at random I was saying “Wow!” as I learned multiple tricks I never heard of. Creek is the real deal! I can’t recommend this book enough.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L. Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Okay book with some good info and thought provoking words - there are no pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Okay book with some good info and thought provoking info. But it is poorly produced. It lacks pictures - there are no pictures, and uses crude drawings to get simple ideas across on some of the pages. The cover pics are very misleading - there are no pictures in the book. Folks looking for a good gift book - there may be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: El Loco Doggie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who are just getting started with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted to be able to use what would be around me in a urban survival senecio . This is exactly what I was looking for. Perfect for those who are just getting started with a survivalist adventure. There is so much great and important information in this book. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa sherriff

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money to me
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased overall and read like half of the book the first night, however when it got to the fire starting chapter I felt like some of it became redundant in MY opinion.
customer_reviews.author: SECRET SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: This is an AWESOME book! I got it for my 13 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME book! I got it for my 13 year old son who is very into the outdoors and repurposing things we already have. It has all kinds of neat ideas on how to make survival things out of stuff that should be lying around in most homes. Goes great with his outdoor plants and all environments survival book and pocketknife he got for Christmas too
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Neese

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the book; however, there weren't enough instructions for me to complete the idea. Needed more instruction and/or diagrams on how to do them. The ideas were great, I just couldn't accomplish most of them.
customer_reviews.author: hpatme

customer_reviews.title: Tried to like it, but ended returning it
customer_reviews.text: I really like Creek Stewart with his survival hacks and lessons. I have been a long-time fan even before he got his own TV show. However, this book disappointed. The illustrations (they were not photos, by the way) were not always clear to decipher, and not every tip had a photo or drawing. Many of the tips were also a bit difficult to follow. I didn't bother reading most of the book and ended up returning it instead. Sorry, Creek. If you found this review helpful, please hit the "Yes" button to encourage me to write more. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Photographer | Tech Pro | Outdoor EnthusiastTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Below average with a few good "hacks"
customer_reviews.text: There is s fee useful "Hacks" in the book but I cant say that I would suggest it to any friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Creek is the man.
customer_reviews.text: Great book, quick tips, and outside the box thinking for people to jump start critical thinking in survival circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Marek Sokt

customer_reviews.title: Creek Stewart fan!
customer_reviews.text: I have watched Creek on television & ordered a few things from his web site & I was happy w/the book. Some of these I already knew about but I learned many new & simple tasks. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: key little secrets to keep you ALIVE
customer_reviews.text: If you watch Creek Stewart on the weather channel this is all his advise in one great book. If 1 thing in here is used it would pay for itself 100 fold.
customer_reviews.author: nancy of Moline

customer_reviews.title: Worth packing in your BO bag
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good book. We bought 3 survival books and I tend to grab this one off the counter for a quick read each time I am in the bathroom for a bit. I will be packing this one into my go bag when I am done reading it. Nice size and plenty of information to make it worthy of taking when SHTF.
customer_reviews.author: Slbond

customer_reviews.title: Avoid it if looking for real reference material
customer_reviews.text: This was a let down. The pages are vague suggestions with one or two crudely hand drawn images. No reference pics or real material. Not really worth it and nothing like the cover would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Survival for Dummies
customer_reviews.text: Found a few good ideas but some of the best are common sense and most of the hacks are ridiculous things that most people would never use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great book for tips.
customer_reviews.text: Been binge watching survival shows and thks book had so many tasks and tips I have seen om shows. A great book for someome starting out learning to be in the bush.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Not just for "survival"
customer_reviews.text: Lots of things were common sense, but you don't realize it until you read it. Highly recommend even for a casual read. Some things made me chuckle, others were "ahh-ha!" moments
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Only a few pictures on how to do hacks.
customer_reviews.text: its ok. refers to various websites for pictures and detail. Should have been in the book. Some of the hacks are assuming you are an urban survivor with access to stuff around you. The hacks for these are good. Again, could have used pictures.
customer_reviews.author: RWF

customer_reviews.title: Good list of ideas.
customer_reviews.text: This book has a good list of improvised ideas that can help in a survival situation. If you are just getting used to looking at old objects in a new way, this book will help.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Cool book!
customer_reviews.text: My teen son loves survival/outdoor things, so we bought him this book, and he has read the entire thing. He really enjoys all of the information.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, not much information I , or most people, dident already know.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Quite dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: The book had a few good "tricks"; however, without more sketches/ diagrams, the book tries to descripe in words what a diagram could clarify. Expected more from Creek.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus J. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Potential life saving hacks everyone should know
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for children and adults. Recommend for anyone who enjoys the outdoors or who plan to start getting back to nature.
customer_reviews.author: The Hudson’s

customer_reviews.title: The most fun wilderness survival book I've read.
customer_reviews.text: Fun book. Filled with off-the-wall ideas (at least for me). I bought this for a workshop. The kids and I have had fun trying several of these out. Definitely recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Frieda J

customer_reviews.title: Liked the book
customer_reviews.text: I love to learn new things believe me this time do you think silly and I thought I was a crappy little such well guess what now I'm more crafty thank you very much and I will buy from you again
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Basic survival information
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the average person looking for basic survival tips.
customer_reviews.author: JimA

customer_reviews.title: Great information
customer_reviews.text: Great information on hacks but I would have liked more pictures
customer_reviews.author: john paul

customer_reviews.title: Lots of really cool tips and tricks
customer_reviews.text: Lots of really cool tips and tricks! I've read lots of manuals and was confident I'd seen most of the stuff I would read before, but this book had lots of concepts I'd never seen or thought of. Great read!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great book, very resourceful ideas!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved all of Creeks work and this was great as well! Keep up the good work Creek! Your fan and fellow Indiana Native up the road a bit!
customer_reviews.author: ashley flueckiger

customer_reviews.title: Good Read
customer_reviews.text: This is a interesting book, You can learn some good things from reading it. If you need something to read in the Dr's office this would be a good one./
customer_reviews.author: DalNavyrm

customer_reviews.title: Great ideas.
customer_reviews.text: Great ideas...some so simple...I wonder why I did not think to do it! I feel that we will have to learn some of these things...I hope not...but the world does not look so wonderful to me as it did as I was a kid...so I try to prepare. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Scholl, Ms

customer_reviews.title: Awesome book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book earlier this year to help me look outside the box to utilize things you wouldn't ordinarily think of to use in case of an emergency. I actually learned things so simple, that you should already know and things i never thought of using. It was very helpful and interesting. I would definitely take the book with me when traveling as a resource in case of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ages 8-100!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so excited when he opened it. Many useful ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as you expect from Creek Stewart
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but the best from Creek Stewart. This is no exception. Fun to read, funny in spots, and just a pure joy. After I got is and read a bit, I told my son how great it is and he took it, I did not see it again until he finished it. It was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: W. Frank Agee

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea of using water filled zip locked bags ...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting Ideas, I just think he should have used Digital Camera photos instead of line drawings. Liked the idea of using water filled zip locked bags to stretch out tight leather boots.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Great book. Easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old son. He loved it. Perfect for anyone looking to learn some new tricks for survival.
customer_reviews.author: Be1bob

customer_reviews.title: "Survival Hack", inspirational inventiveness!
customer_reviews.text: Great job Mr. Stewart! Very much enjoyed reviewing the book. Gets the mind activated to expand on additional "hacks". Makes me want to renew my membership in Scouts. The boys would very much enjoy a "Survival Hacks" session at each meeting. They might resist making and wearing the "Bra Cup Debris Mask", though. Thank you for the energy this book lit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to save every soda can, pop bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Be ready to save every soda can, pop bottle, and any number of "widgets" to try these hacks! My 11 year old son has tried nearly every one in the book!
customer_reviews.author: Paix

customer_reviews.title: Novice Level
customer_reviews.text: I interesting, but definitely only for the beginning novice. Not all are practical in survival. This is not a book I would keep in my survival backpack, it to elementary.
customer_reviews.author: badger chilly

customer_reviews.title: Great project book with son
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely devoured this book and continues to astonish friends, teachers, den leaders, neighbors and anyone else who will listen with his survival hacks, facts, and skills!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fabish

customer_reviews.title: Creative, Clever, Life-Saving Information
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. There is always another way to do something, and always something else you can do it with - no matter what it is you are trying to do. Creek Stewart explains so many ideas for using everyday items to make a survival - or even a camping - situation more tolerable. If you're stuck without a candle, knowing how to use other items in your home or car or camping gear might mean the difference between a comfy night and a very, very long night. There is an idea for everyone. You won't look at stuff the same way again! Thank you so much, Creek!
customer_reviews.author: Kim A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift for Bathroom-Readers and Preppers Alike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. I know he loved it because it's in his bathroom, near the toilet, open to one of the pages halfway through the book... it seems to be wearing quite well, no pages lost or torn... nor used for bathroom tissue.
customer_reviews.author: ARedberrytree

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have it yet, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! I have highlighted, underlined & turned down corners of pages! There are some of the neatest ideas that work. I thought over & over again, "this is a great idea! How did he come up with this?". Thanks Creek!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Creek Stewart is a master of improvisation, and he shares many of his proven hacks in this book. As well as a great resource for seasoned adults, this might even be a good book for kids, to introduce them to a lifetime of innovation. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NanoShopper

customer_reviews.title: Novel and useful ideas!
customer_reviews.text: Easy reading and instructions! Wonderful ideas for thinking outside the box!
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: A rehash of simple outdoor features. The person that could use the book would be someone that has never been camping.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Half way through and I am enjoying what I've learned ...
customer_reviews.text: Half way through and I am enjoying what I've learned from it. It's even given me new ways to do things I already know.
customer_reviews.author: Einar

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly useful
customer_reviews.text: Creek Stewart is a master of Bushcraft and survival. To be able to have such survival hacks and tips in a book form to practice and use is priceless. Well worth the purchase. Do yourself a favor and order it now!
customer_reviews.author: William Legg

customer_reviews.title: Recommended For Your Bug Out Bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent resource for survival. Love a lot of the ideas. Many of the other survival books I have read simply stick to the basics in the woods/desert without considering modern material. This is a must for any bugout bag.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Procede with caution
customer_reviews.text: Bunch of cheap tricks. This book would contribute little to your survival if you were lost in the wilderness. Just not comprehensive enough for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: littljeane

customer_reviews.title: Very well done book for those who camp or hike.
customer_reviews.text: Many learned in military survival school, but some really new innovative 'hacks' too, worth reading and passing on to family boy or girl scout.
customer_reviews.author: TJS222

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for a "Good Ole Boy" i know
customer_reviews.text: This book was so good that I actually read it before I gave it as a gift. There are a lot of great hacks in there with common items that you can find day to day. Would make a great camper book.
customer_reviews.author: shawn folstad

customer_reviews.title: Useful knowledge in a bind
customer_reviews.text: A lot of useful tips. You never know what might come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Getting a Arsenal

customer_reviews.title: Another good addition to your library.
customer_reviews.text: This is another valuable addition to have if that day ever comes. You may know some of the hacks, but an urban dweller will find lots of valuable information inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient soul

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Has some pretty cool things in it, but was a little more lame than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sue R.

customer_reviews.title: Fine reading - better practicing.
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I have tried less than half the book and it is a great learning experience.
customer_reviews.author: Avi8or

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool little book, amazed at the gadgets one can use to survive
customer_reviews.author: Bishmaya

customer_reviews.title: Some good ideas
customer_reviews.text: A lot of these hacks are great info, and some are nothing new. A good book for beginning preppers, but enough info to interest experienced people, too.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: Very cool book. Lots of interesting ideas and illustrations to go with them.

customer_reviews.title: Really good book
customer_reviews.text: Love this book it is a real eye-opener keeps you intrigued and it's raised my eyebrows a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lee Collins

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME DATA! WONDERFUL BOOK!
customer_reviews.text: This book blew me away, EVERY hack makes sense and you just wonder why YOU didn't think of it. Amazing! Everyone should have this book, I'm buying more for friends.

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty sweet. I like survivorman on discovery channel
customer_reviews.text: Still checking this out, it's pretty sweet. I like survivorman on discovery channel, and this is the kind of reading to go along with that. Great price, fast shipping, A+.
customer_reviews.author: incognito

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good information in this book. I haven't read all of it but it's a good book.

customer_reviews.title: Good Reference; Easy to Read; Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: An great book--lot's of good tips to help you "think outside the box" when it comes to survival situations. I wish it had a few more illustrations, especially on some of the more involved hacks.
customer_reviews.author: Old Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Good information
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed reading this book. Loads of interesting ideas for work arounds when in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Capt_denis

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious Use of Every-Day Objects
customer_reviews.text: Has some very clever, every-day objects which can be used for survival. Ingenious! Gave it as a gift to a friend who will know how to use the tips.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophiledw

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: Useful tips. Some I knew about already and some I didn't know about before and am glad to learn about them. I recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dang

customer_reviews.title: Read all about it!
customer_reviews.text: All survival books offer something of value... this one offers a lot of value! Buy it and read it... the test is on Monday! LOL! Good reading, interesting, and educational all in one!
customer_reviews.author: BadBoyBob

customer_reviews.title: GREAThiw to SUCCEDE in the Wilds  not just survive.
customer_reviews.text: Interesting and well written easy to read( and follow) directions/ suggestions on how to succeed not just survive in the wilds.
customer_reviews.author: Factual  Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Learned a good bit of tricks and things to use for life
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This book has many clever, useful ideas. I wish, though, there were at least some black and white photos to go with the tips. A few stick drawings were included. This section of the book showcases resourcefulness with stray items.......the author clearly visualizes and MacGyvers things better than this gal. In the last few pages, seven EDC lists were provided ....with pictures. I found these pages to be the most helpful out of everything in the book. These EDC kits were in a variety of sizes, but all were refreshingly "regular wallet" priced.
customer_reviews.author: CBP

customer_reviews.title: Recommend anyone going camping and back packing
customer_reviews.text: Very informational just as I was told it would be. Recommend anyone going camping and back packing, read this first.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: I like the information contained in it
customer_reviews.text: I like the information contained in it. it shows how to re-purpose certain items for other uses. It is going in my bug out bag. I can't memorize everything in the book instantly anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco P. what are you talking about?             talking abot

customer_reviews.title: Bright Ideas, You should have the book
customer_reviews.text: Who would have thought survival items are all around. Just look pick up and enjoy a very informative book. I plan to use these in our Boy Scout troop.
customer_reviews.author: Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent information! Presented simply yet detailed enough to execute instructions
customer_reviews.author: Dayna L. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Transaction
customer_reviews.text: Received the book exactly as it was described, and it was delivered in the expected time. I recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Ok, nothing really new unless you are new to prepping.
customer_reviews.author: Gentry D. Karr

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant hacks!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous book with the most amazing hacks. Each one is a gem. I can't wait to get out and try them. Brilliant book!
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Great book but could be better with a few more illustrations.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give it 4.5 because some of the pages could use illustrations, especially when it is something you are unfamiliar with.
customer_reviews.author: Milo W. DoddsTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Short stories,  easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Stories are quite informative and don't get boring in over explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Dee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of really useful ideas and information. Creek Stewart is one of the very best on the subject of bushcraft and survival, and does not disappoint in this volume. He has perhaps the most balanced and reasonable outlook of the many writers on the subject, and is highly articulate and inspiring. This book not only teaches numerous "hacks" for survival in any situation, but also inspires you to innovate and come up with alternatives in any number of survival scenarios. A really great reference piece, which will help you use your creative thinking ability in tough times.
customer_reviews.author: RC Evans

customer_reviews.title: A true survivalists handbook.
customer_reviews.text: Great information and useful. Covering materials for both urban and wilderness survival. Also references for video demonstration. Author stresses application and practice. Many skills can be acquired from this book.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Love the hints and tips in this book
customer_reviews.text: Love the hints and tips in this book. After spending about 2 hours looking through a bunch of survival books in the bookstore, this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Survival Hacks- something out of nothing
customer_reviews.text: Creek Stewart has some gems of ideas from what you would find nearly anywhere- as was taught in military "improvise-adapt- overcome".
customer_reviews.author: David C. Burch

product_meta.title: Survival Hacks: Over 200 Ways to Use Everyday Items for Wilderness Survival
